result.rule: API is not support initial ctor signature (arkts-builtin-new-cotr)
Please init elements of array before read elements. If not, there will be a runtime error. We recommend you to use Array.create<T>(len, T) (arkts-builtin-uninitialized-element)
Use explicit types instead of "any", "unknown" (arkts-no-any-unknown)
API is not support initial ctor signature (arkts-builtin-new-cotr)
Type inference in case of generic function calls is limited (arkts-no-inferred-generic-params)
